title: Mobicoop
subtitle:
A local, friendly and united carpooling service.
Find your carpooling now or propose your trip.

swap.help: Click to swap start and destination addresses

regular.label: Regular journey
regular.help: Click this switch to specify that your trip is occasional then choose a date

punctual.help: Click this switch to specify that your trip is regular

switch.aria-label: If the switch is active, you will post a regular ad. If not, this will be a punctual one.

ariaLabelOrgin: Une adresse de départ est requise
ariaLabelDestination: Une adresse de destination est requise
